mapper.insert: insert into review values ( '${memberId}', ${gServNo}, '${nickName}', '${rTitle}', '${rContent}', '${rImg}', ${rStar}, 0, review_seq.nextval, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select rev.*, gs.gServTitle from review rev, gService gs where memberId='${memberId}' and rev.gServNo=${gServNo} and rev.gServNo = gs.gServNo
mapper.update: update review set rTitle ='${rTitle}', rContent='${rContent}', rImg ='${rImg}', rStar ='${rStar}', rHit=0, rGroup=review_seq.nextval, rStep=0, rIndent=0, rCredate=sysdate where memberId='${memberId}' and gServNo=${gServNo}
